pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Classified ads is an attempt to re-produce parts of the functionality that went away when Usenet news ceased to exist. This attempt tries to fix the problem of disappearing news-servers so that there is no servers required and no service-providers needed for any operation; data storage is implemented inside client applications that users are running. Features of the program currently include:
* Posting of ads online. Ads have a category ; there are some pre-defined categories but more can be invented just by typing over the suggested categories. * Replying to ads either in public or privately to operator. * (Small-sized) binary attachments to posts. * Providing basic data of operators - data that operator may enter himself, or leave blank. * Basic searching of content based on words.
